FAQ / Wave 6 / Keywords /

Tentacle Upgrades

  1. CUSTOM CARD
    Tentacle Upgrades     [Source: BFA World|Strike]
    Similar to Battle Master, Tentacle is a new Upgrade Trait introduced in Wave BFA World|Strike.
  2. CUSTOM CARD
    Armed to the Teeth     [Source: BFA World|Strike]
    This card will also allow you to play in multiples Weapons that can fit into a single Weapons slot, including Tentacle Upgrades and Multi-Missile Pod.
